message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you! Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm trying to stay within my budget of $12,000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500, but that's my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm trying to get as close to my budget as possible.
